name: Soldier of Failure
description:
Soldier of Failure is a simple 2D platformer with shooter elements. Imagine that there is a war. You play as a soldier whose main objective is the collection of weapons and destruction of enemy equipment. After you destroy all the enemy artillery and gather all the ammo on the location, for you will be opened a pass, passing through which will take you to the next level. Be careful on every step a variety of traps is waiting for you. Good luck!



  • A large number of various levels.
  • Animated graphics.
  • Simple, interesting gameplay.
  • Unforgettable adventures.
